articles.title: Sanctioned Russian tycoon’s megayacht is free to dock at SA ports, says Presidency - News24
articles.description: South Africa’s government said it has “no reason” to apply sanctions brought against Russian tycoon Alexey Mordashov and that his $500 million megayacht is free to dock at its ports.
